data.text: E Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziam fam!
Tina an ingangarir ekiar an amiziba bar, dagh eghanam?
Gumazamizir an Akar Gavgavimɨn gɨn ghua arazir aghuibagh amiba,
O Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨ uan gumazamizibar akurvaghsɨ izɨ
Nɨ ua bagha mɨsevezir gumazamiziba kɨ men gantɨ,
E, en ovaviba fomɨra arazir kuram gamizɨ moghɨn,
Fomɨra, en ovaviba Isipɨn kantrin aven ikia,
God uan ziar ekiam bangɨn,
An Akar Gavgavim Ongarir Aghevim ganɨngi, ezɨ a dakegha mɨsɨngi.
A gumazamizir kabar apanibar dafaribar ua me ini.
Ongarim bar men apaniba avezɨ, me bar ariaghire.
Dughiar kamɨn Israelia an akam nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikia,
Egha me bar zuamɨra an amizir bizir kam gɨn amada.
Me gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ikia
God, me an azangsɨzir bizimɨn ganigha a ikara,
Gɨn me gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ikia,
Ezɨ nguazim akam akarizɨ Datan ko Abiram uan adarazi ko
Ezɨ avim izaghira men gɨn zui darazir isia,
Me Horepɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn ikia
Me Godɨn ziar ekiam akɨrim ragha agasaragha,
Godra, Isipɨn kantrin ingangarir ekiabagh amigha,
Kamaghɨn, God ghaze, a uan gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨgham.
God akar dɨkɨrɨzim me ganɨga ghaze,
Egha me uan purirpenibar aven ikia
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, God akar dɨkɨrɨzim me danɨngasa,
A men gɨn otivamin ovavir boribar amutɨ,
Me gɨn aser mam, an ziam Bal,
Ezɨ me amizir arazir kurar kam bangɨn,
Finias dɨkavigha
God bizir Finias amizir kam gɨnɨghnɨgha egha a dɨbora ghaze,
Israelia gɨn Meriban dɨpamɨn ikia amir araziba God gamizɨ an atari,
Guizbangɨra, men arazir kam Moses gamizɨ an atarava bar osemegha
Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze, ia Kenanɨn gumazamiziba bar me mɨsueghtɨ me arɨmɨghiregh.
Israelia kantrin igharaziba ko ikia
Me men asebar marvir guabar ziaba fe,
Me uari uan otariba ko guiviba isa aseba bagha me mɨsozi me ariaghɨrima,
Me uari uan otariba ko guivibav sozi me ariaghiri.
Me arazir kam gamua uari uari gami
Ikiavɨra Itir God uan gumazamizibar atara
Egha me isa Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar dafaribagh arɨki,
Men apanir kaba me gativagha men gara
Dughiar avɨribar God uan gumazamizibar akurvasi,
Me Ikiavɨra Itir God ko mɨgeir dughiabar,
A ua uan Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim ginɨrɨgha
A ua men apanir men suirazibar nɨghnɨzibagh irazɨ,
O Ikiavɨra Itir God, en God, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn en akuragh!
E Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziam feka,
